Field.Label: Leave blank for default or specify full path to a folder that will be used by the plugin to store cover art images (defaults to '/Library/Application Support/Perceptive Automation/<Indigo version e.g. Indigo 2023.1>/ Preferences/Plugins/com.indigodomo.indigoplugin.autologsqueezeboxcontroller'). This folder will contain a folder named "autolog_squeezebox_cover_art", which will itself contain a folder for each Squeezebox player device. The Squeezebox player device folder name will be the Indigo device id.

Leave blank for default or specify full path to a folder that can be used by the plugin to store temporary announcement work files (defaults to (defaults to '/Library/Application Support/Perceptive Automation/<Indigo version e.g. Indigo 2023.1>/ Preferences/Plugins/com.indigodomo.indigoplugin.autologsqueezeboxcontroller'). This folder will contain a folder named "autolog_squeezebox_announcements", which will itself contain a folder for each Squeezebox player device. The Squeezebox player device folder name will be the Indigo device id.
Logging is done to a file independant of the Indigo Event log. The log files are rotated and a maximum of 5 days logs are retained.

Specify full path to a folder that can be used by the plugin to create an 'autolog/squeezebox/debug' folder hierarchy for a debugging log file set (defaults to '/Library/Application Support') which will result in a folder '/Library/Application Support/autolog/squeezebox/debug' being created.
Detailed Debug:
Field.Description: Enable detail logging for internal logic.

Field.Label: Monitor Listen:
Field.Description: Enable logging of notifications from the Squeezebox server.

Field.Label: Debug Announcement Playing:
Field.Description: Enable logging for announcement playing logic.

Field.Label: Monitor Interface Send:
Field.Description: Enable logging of commands sent to the Squeezebox server interface.

Field.Label: Monitor Interface Receive:
Field.Description: Enable logging of commands received from the Squeezebox server interface.

Field.Label: Monitor Server response:
Field.Description: Enable logging of queued responses received from the Squeezebox server.

Field.Label: Debug Threading:
Field.Description: Enable logging of Squeezebox communication threads.
